backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing core backend logic including access control, user roles and profiles, blob storage integration, Stripe subscription configuration, and video metadata/moderation state with persistent stable variables.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report documenting the removal of the /faq page, related routes, and navigation links, including affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated JSON-style map summarizing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files and components for build and feature planning.
frontend/docs/dev-notes/react-185-video-: Developer note explaining the root cause of a React maximum update depth error on the VideoPage and how a useEffect cleanup with a mutation caused an infinite render loop.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app defining metadata, page title, favicon assets, and mounting the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application setup using TanStack Router with all route definitions, global layout (header, footer, banners, modals), theme provider, and not-found handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminVerificatio: UI banner component that verifies admin access via backend checks and local storage, persists admin sessions, and displays a dismissible admin confirmation alert.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Minimal footer component rendering copyright text and navigation links (Pricing, Terms, Privacy, Support) with gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header handling authentication via Internet Identity, showing login/logout, user info, and conditional admin dropdown based on backend verification or stored admin session.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their display name before continuing.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Reusable share button that opens a dropdown to copy a video link or a timestamped link to the clipboard with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/VideoGrid.tsx: Grid of video cards displaying thumbnails, uploader info, likes, status badges, and actions like play, share, and conditional delete for owners or admins.
frontend/src/components/VideoRouteErrorB: Error boundary UI for video routes that shows a friendly error message and allows navigation back to the home page, with details in development mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on the current identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook that manage Internet Identity authentication, login/logout flow, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend canisters, including user profiles, video upload and management, admin checks, moderation, and various video/category queries with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, color variables, and light/dark theme styles applied across the application.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Utility for persisting and validating an admin session in localStorage with versioning, revalidation, and forced reset support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app, wiring up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ArchitecturePage.tsx: Static informational page displaying a systems architecture diagram and descriptions of the multi-canister Internet Computer ecosystem.
Admin-only page for managing banned words used in content moderation, with UI to add/remove words and re-run moderation across all videos.
frontend/src/pages/FAQPage.tsx: Placeholder or empty FAQ page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that displays featured videos, video listings, categories, and search functionality with debounced queries.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: 404 error page that informs users a route was not found and provides a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSettingsPage.t: Placeholder page for payment settings with no current implementation.
frontend/src/pages/PolicyPage.tsx: Renders a static Community & Ethics Policy page using cards and icons to outline platform values, commitments, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays pricing plans (Free, Pro, Creator Plus) and integrates with Stripe to handle paid plan checkout, including live configuration status and admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Provides a static Privacy Policy page describing data collection, usage, security practices, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's profile with avatar, video count, and a grid of their uploaded videos, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Renders a static Support page with contact information, common help topics, response expectations, and basic troubleshooting tips.
frontend/src/pages/TempStripeSettingsPag: Admin-only page for viewing and partially updating Stripe configuration settings, with authentication checks, form controls, and persistence via backend APIs.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays a static Terms of Service page outlining acceptable use, content responsibility, platform limitations, liability, and change policy.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: Implements the video upload page with form fields, category selection, authentication checks, upload progress/status handling, and client-side thumbnail capture from a selected video using canvas. Integrates upload mutations, toasts, and navigation after successful uploads.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPage.tsx: Implements the video watch page with playback, likes, comments, continue-watching resume, thumbnail updates, deletion, and sharing. Includes admin/owner controls, moderation status handling, and progress persistence via multiple query hooks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme tokens (colors, radius), animations, and plugins for animations and typography. Uses CSS variables and OKLCH color space for theming.
project_state.json: Project metadata snapshot describing the current product vision, UX decisions, deployed features, and historical context for Xocial.Stream. Enumerates existing features with IDs, versions, and descriptions to track system capabilities.
